summary:
It retextures the armor on the husky from Dawnguard.
Basically it changes the red parts to your choice
-----------------------------------------
.::!DAWNGUARD REQUIRED!::.
descriptionHtml:
I really didn\'t like the red parts on the husky\'s armor, so I retextured it to a grayish black.
In the end I\'ve decided to make a compilation of armors.So there are different versions now.
It doesn\'t change the texture of the husky itself, it only changes the color of the armor.
DAWNGUARD EXPANISON REQUIRED!!!

Installation
-------------------------------------------------------
Extract the rar into your \"C:\\Program Files\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V-Skyrim\\Data\" folder. (overwrite if asked)


How to get different colored huskies?
--------------------------------------------------------
If you want a different texture for your husky, use one of bellyache\'s wolf textures.
1.Choose your one of the wolf textures.(wolf.dds)
2.Create a copy of it.
3.Rename wolf.dds to husky.dds, and the copy of wolf.dds to husky2.dds
4.Drop husky.dds and husky2.dds into your 
\"C:\\Program Files\\Bethesda Softworks\\The Elder Scrolls V-Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\dlc01\\armoreddog\" folder.(overwrite if asked)
5.You\'re done.Your husky should now have the texture you chose.
The link to these textures can be found at the end of the description.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The texutres my husky has on the pictures ARE NOT MINE!(except the armor obviously)
I used one of bellyache\'s wolf textures, you can do that too using the instructions above.

Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621//?
author: Chrisz96
